summary: Graphical mod, using the latest version of ENB v.102 +FX + Realistic Lighting v.1.6 by 747823! The main feature it\'s a definitely incredible nights by totaly changing principles of lighting. Realistic light shades, Blue day natural sky, calm lights falling to the ground \"effect\" in the night.
descriptionHtml:
Sindell Mega\'tune ENB FXAA shader3 + Realistic lights 1.1

Hello everyone!
I tuned up graphical mod, using the latest version of ENB v.102 +FX + Realistic Lighting Without Post-Processing v.1.6 by 747823! The main feature it\'s a definitely incredible the nights by totaly changing principles of light by Realistic Lighting mod. I like him, but it\'s not optimized. Very dark nights...very dark in caves and in houses. Night - just a big problem. And with my settings \"black\" changes to beautiful dark. U can see the difference by own eyes. Its a big difference with original. Optimized FXAA setting, designed to achieve more realistic, natural gameplay. By using RL without post processing + tuned up shadows & grass fade achieved better performance in the game even on middle PCs with high-ultra settings!

Also check your settings in the file skyrimprefs.ini, optional i attached skyrimprefs settings with fixed shadows & tuned up fade settings into \"optional\" folder!

Attached 20 screenshots.
Please leave comments, your feelings. They are very interesting to me.

Official page Realistic Lighting (RL) mod:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4323

This mod is targeted at a medium and high-end PC.

=INSTALLATION=
1) Extract the contents of archive into your main Skyrim directory with the game executable. 
2) Plug-file to skyrim game \"Realistic Lighting - Full.esp\".
3) Check your settings in the file skyrimprefs.ini with my optional setting file

=COMMENTS=
1) STRONGLY RECOMMENDED using only with Realistic Lighting - Full.esp graphic mod.
2) If you full copy my skyrimprefs.ini, SET YOUR display resolution, to changing iSize H & iSize W settings. 
3) For default - SSAO disabled. In my system it cuts 10-20 FPS with 3 times more load screen without some graphical significant advantages. For Enabled, open enbseries.ini, and add a line: bFloatPointRenderTarget=1, and set EnableAmbientOcclusion=true, UseIndirectLighting=true  
4) Be aware! SKSE module with Acceleration layer not only increase productivity but also spoil the shadows.
5) If you have low FPS, change first of all shadow settings, also grass settings eating a decent FPS.
U can change some settings to boost FPS without Graphical loss + fix shadows. In skyrimprefs.ini:
iShadowMapResolutionPrimary=2048
iShadowMaskQuarter=5 
iBlurDeferredShadowMask=4 
fShadowDistance=1024 
fInteriorShadowDistance=1024 
fShadowLODMaxStartFade=1000.0 
fSpecularLODMaxStartFade=2000.0 
fGrassStartFadeDistance=1024.0000 
fGrassMaxStartFadeDistance=2048.0000 
fGrassMinStartFadeDistance=400.0000 
 
=VERSIONS=
21.01.2012 - start version 1.0b
23.01.2012 - updated to 1.1
- Full overall color & brightness balance /day & night
- Real nights
- More real light shades /day & night
- Blue day natural sky
- Calm lights falling to the ground \"effect\" in the night 
Enjoy!

=RECOMMENDATIONS=
PLEASE USE with graphical mod this:
1) Enhanced Night Skyrim v04 Color Galaxy + Enhanced Night Skyrim v04 High Stars by CptJoker71
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=85
2) Alternate Sun Glare by isoku
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1653
3) Dramatic Clouds by Anarin
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4910
4) Immersive Skyrim Thunder V5 by Wordeee
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1702

With best regards, Skyarkhangel
author: skyarkhangel
